Text: Re fert Cc I have not yet spoken I will overnight the financial data to you to arrive before Thursday of this week Kind Regards George Dorsey
fert Cc sent today by FedEx RGDS

fert Cc Greg today and had a nice conversation He encouraged me to call you Having missed you today I wanted to make a few suggestions With regard to your reservations about an investment in plant and equipment I understand that any such investment would be limited and subject to your being very attracted to the deal I am confident that I can bring you deals that will sell themselves need to have an exit strategy that would allow an exit within years A trading strategy without investment in plant and equipment will yield attractive results With regard to how that would look I will draft a short business plan and send it to you next week basing it on a pure trading basis Let me invite you and Greg to a breakfast or any other meal during the week of Jan That will give me a chance to get a few numbers in your hand prior Regards for the New Year George Dorsey

fert Cc Greg today and had a nice conversation He encouraged me to call you Having missed you today I wanted to make a few suggestions With regard to your reservations about an investment in plant and equipment I understand that any such investment would be limited and subject to your being very attracted to the deal I am confident that I can bring you deals that will sell themselves need to have an exit strategy that would allow an exit within years A trading strategy without investment in plant and equipment will yield attractive results With regard to how that would look I will draft a short business plan and send it to you next week basing it on a pure trading basis Let me invite you and Greg to a breakfast or any other meal during the week of Jan That will give me a chance to get a few numbers in your hand prior Regards for the New Year George Dorsey

Trade DevelopmentMarch I left a message for you explaining that I was accepting an offer from ElPaso That decision followed my having brought together the pieces of a project that John Nowland indicated Enron was not prepared to consider and my subsequent presentation of the project to ElPaso who embraced the deal John indicated that the day delay he inserted into our discussions resulted from your having considered Trammo I understand that Trammo is no longer a target for Enron and wondered therefore if our getting together for an hour would be timely The industry still presents a target rich environment and you are still the biggest horse in the race Kind Regards George Dorsey
